short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: auto scroll page on a timer

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Page Auto Scroll is a lightweight Chrome extension designed to automatically scroll through long web pages, allowing you to read articles, view image galleries, or browse documents without manually scrolling. This extension provides a smooth and customizable scrolling experience, making it easier to consume content on the web.
